name: Gallup
description: We help our clients in many ways. But it all starts with a single focus: We use our understanding of the human experience to help our clients solve their greatest challenges and seize their greatest opportunities. Combining more than 85 years of experience with its global reach, Gallup knows more about the attitudes and behaviors of employees, customers, students and citizens than any other organization in the world.
Headline: Analytics and advice that help leaders and organizations solve their most pressing problems.
ShortDescription: The Art and Science of What's Humanly Possible.

Highlights.name: The CliftonStrengths® Assessment
Highlights.description: Find the Report That's Right for You. Whether you're discovering your own CliftonStrengths or empowering others to develop theirs, we can help. Find the perfect CliftonStrengths solution for your situation.

Highlights.name: Gallup Access
Highlights.description: Engage employees, develop managers and build a winning workplace culture with Gallup Access, the only software proven to turn human potential into business performance.

Highlights.name: Q12® Survey
Highlights.description: For decades, employers have been measuring employee engagement the wrong way - or neglecting to measure it at all. But Gallup has the solution: Time after time, these 12 items have proven to be the most effective survey questions to measure employee engagement.

enhanced_description: Gallup leverages over 85 years of experience and global insights to provide analytics and strategic advice aimed at solving critical organizational challenges and seizing opportunities. Their offerings focus on understanding human attitudes and behaviors to improve employee happiness and engagement, and drive business performance. Key components include the CliftonStrengths® Assessment for individual and team development, Gallup Access software for employee engagement, manager development, and workplace culture building, and the proprietary Q12® Survey for effectively measuring employee engagement.
competitive_advantages: Over 85 years of experience and global reach in understanding human attitudes and behaviors
Proprietary software 'Gallup Access' proven to turn human potential into business performance
Proprietary 'Q12® Survey' proven as the most effective questions for measuring employee engagement
Recognized expertise in employee engagement and strengths-based development
roi_benefits: Enhanced business performance through human potential
